channel.title: 3 Questions. -Help-
channel.description:
Hello, i goit a 508 server.
But i got 3 questions?
Number one how to i add 138 combat to it?
If you got 1 summoning. combat = 126 (if you got all combat skills 99 exept summoning) if you got 99 summoning combat = 138 (if you got all combat skills 99 inclusive summoning)
Plz post code and to put where.
Number two:
How do i add range to my 508 rune c'bow dont working : I wear it but i just punch :S
post code plz.
Number 3 :
How do i add ancients to it? I got the ancients spellbook on my screen click on ice barrage ( i got the runes ) But, its just says "Cast Icebarrage" and not : "Cast Icebarrage on player :
Also please post code!
Ill rep+

  1. Change the formula.
  2. Add the animation/hitdiff.
  3. Not sure as I fail at 508s lel.
  4. Learn Java, as no one here will spoonfeed you.

Read full topic

item.title: 3 Questions. -Help-

item.description:
@ohbpking wrote:

Hello, i goit a 508 server.

But i got 3 questions?

Number one how to i add 138 combat to it?

If you got 1 summoning. combat = 126 (if you got all combat skills 99 exept summoning)
if you got 99 summoning combat = 138 (if you got all combat skills 99 inclusive summoning)

Plz post code and to put where.

Number two:

How do i add range to my 508 rune c’bow dont working : I wear it but i just punch :S
